sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react"; import Cards from '../components/Cards'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; const pageStyle = { backgroundColor:"gradient gre", border: "75px solid", padding: "10px 10px 10px 10px", boxShadow: "30px 25px 30px 25px", background: "grey", width:"200%" } const queryUrl ="https://www.googleapis.com/civicinfo/v2/representatives?key=AIzaSyD94j3PxJF135ewOPPSHaPh49-9g9rk6dY&address=Philadelphia,PA"; // const alignLeft={ // al // } class Home extends Component{ state={ txtArray: ["65% millennials fail to vote in local elections , which has been proven to have more of an direct effect on their lives", "Statitics show that you are more likely to be heard when you are activley engaging with your elected officials" ], title: [], reps:[] } componentDidMount(){ this.loadElects() } loadElects = id => { // eslint-disable-next-line no-undef fetch(queryUrl) .then(results => { console.log(results) return results.json();}) .then(res => { console.log(res); this.setState({reps : res.officials}) }) } render(){ return( Hey, nice to see you

Welcome to Civics City!

An engaged citizen is crucial to improving your community.

={4} {this.state.txtArray.map((item, index) => Cards(item,index))} {/* {this.state.title.map((item, index) => Card(item,index))} */}

Elected Officials for Philadelphia, PA {this.state.reps.map(rep => {rep.name} {rep.phones[0]} {rep.urls} )} //
/*}

First slide label

Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue mollis interdum.

Second slide label

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

 */ /* {this.state.txtArray.map((item, index) => Card(item,index))} {this.state.title.map((item, index) => Card(item,index))} */ ) } } export default Home;
